title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server for downloading and running Llama 2, Code Llama, Mistral, Gemma, and other GGUF models locally with one command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library that wraps Ollama’s REST API; install via pip install ollama.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; npm install ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package (langchain-ollama on PyPI) that adds Ollama models as LLM and embeddings providers.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama; features multi-model chats, code highlighting, and admin panel.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Tauri-based desktop GUI for macOS/Windows/Linux to manage and chat with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration enabling Ollama models as generators and embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-copilots
summary: Curated list of IDE copilot plugins (VS Code, JetBrains, Vim) that connect to local Ollama endpoints.

title: ollama-cli-chat
summary: Interactive CLI chat shell with history, prompt templates, and markdown rendering powered by Ollama.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and PVC model caching.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB + Streamlit UI to chat with local documents.

title: ollama-dify
summary: Dify.ai integration that registers Ollama as a custom model provider for no-code LLM app builders.

title: ollama-llamaindex
summary: LlamaIndex LLM and embedding drivers for Ollama; pip install llama-index-llms-ollama.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Official n8n node that adds Ollama chat and embedding actions to no-code automation workflows.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI service that proxies and extends Ollama endpoints with JWT auth, rate limits, and usage metrics.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Python Slack Bolt bot that answers questions using local Ollama models with thread support and admin ACLs.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord.py bot that streams Ollama responses in Discord channels with slash commands and model picker.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds “Ask Ollama” command to summarize or rewrite notes using local models.

title: ollama-macos-menu
summary: Swift native macOS menu-bar app to start/stop Ollama server and switch models from the status bar.

title: ollama-ray
summary: Ray Serve example that horizontally scales Ollama inference workers across a Ray cluster.
